scripts.bundle:done: TARGET=$npm_package_directories_lib node -e 'if (!require("fs").existsSync(process.env.TARGET)) console.error("Create bundle please") && process.exit(1)'
scripts.preserve: npm run bundle && shx mkdir -p $npm_package_directories_deps/$npm_package_directories_component && shx cp -R $npm_package_directories_lib/* $npm_package_directories_deps/$npm_package_directories_component
scripts.prebundle: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p $npm_package_directories_lib && shx cp *.html $npm_package_directories_lib && shx cp -R $npm_package_directories_example $npm_package_directories_lib
scripts.version:bower: VERSION=$npm_package_version node -e 'const b = require("./bower.json"); b.version = process.env.VERSION; require("fs").writeFileSync("./bower.json", JSON.stringify(b, null, 2))'
scripts.version: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:edit && git add CHANGELOG.md && npm run version:bower && git add bower.json
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop && git merge master && git push && git checkout master
